main.name: Honours Project
main.description: I'm currently working on my honours project, involving using computer vision techniques to transform ascent footage from a camera swinging below a weather balloon into a stabilised 360 video showing the earth.

main.name: Sidetabs
main.description: Sidetabs is the Firefox browser extension I develop. Designed to match the look and feel of Firefox's default horizontal tabs, Sidetabs adds a vertical tab bar, and allows the horizontal tab bar to be removed.

main.name: Binge Benchmark
main.description: A website for finding out whether a TV show is worth sticking with. Using rating data from trakt.tv, and metadata from tmdb.org, users can view ratings graphs, to find the public consensus on the quality of a show.

other.name: Promptle
other.description: Prompt the AI to say the word of the day

other.name: Youtube Subs RSS
other.description: A simple script for generating OPML files of RSS feeds for your Youtube subscriptions

other.name: Casio-Basic Apps
other.description: A collection of apps and games for the Casio fx9860 series of calculators

other.name: Login Languish

other.name: Mandelbrot Explorer
other.description: A simple Java GUI app for exploring the Mandelbrot set
